actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to establish fishing zones of the United States beyond its territorial seas, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes the fishing zone of the United States beyond its territorial seas to lines drawn following the 100 fathom depth contour except that such lines shall be at least 9 nautical miles from the nearest point of the inner boundary.

titles.title: A bill to establish fishing zones of the United States beyond its territorial seas, and for other purposes.
